name: Alec Bradley - Post Embargo - Gordo
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Post Embargo delivers a 91-rated profile of cashews, almonds and cedar with leathery textures and touch of sweetness around the edges. A caramel-hued Honduran wrapper embraces a complex recipe of Honduran and Nicaraguan long-fillers with a medium to full-bodied conclusion. Taste a rich cigar, handcrafted in Honduras and blended to commemorate a potential future time period when Cuban and non-Cuban cigars will again compete in the premium U.S. marketplace.
